name: Fumuhumu
description:
This is a chain reaction puzzle game made for Triple Trijam.

Objective: transport a number of yellow balls from start to the end of the level through a series of obstacles.

Controls for the game:

Just LMB to click and drag some stuff around

The first build was made in about 3h 1 minute

The second build was made in about 3h

The third build was made in about 2h and 58 minutes (I game myself a little less just to make sure I was fair)

And since I had 1 more minute to spare,  after some game testing we found a very nasty bug which I managed to fix in one minute (not the cleanest fix but it works) - I have video evidence!
